::KitKat::

She leaned on him. She kissed him again.  She walked down the 
hallway  with him.  She took a step and stumbled.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Ok, lets get you home." He said, bracing her up.
> "If you need help, lean on me." He said, kissing her again.
> He started to walking slowly, so she wouldn't loos her balance.
